text: So, for the final outcome I will use chalk on chalkboard. Most likely white chalk for most of the animation, using coloured chalk for effect, maybe on the fire or Poseidon's eyes when he looks at the audience. Draw each scene and then rub it out, taking photos of it and animating it on a computer

For the human form coming out of the water it's going to be raining and the sea is going to become bigger and bigger by taking up more space and then there will be splashes and the shadow of a human figure would start forming. Then when it's clear it's something human it would change scene and Poseidon looking up would appear
